# Clean Environment
```{r}
#clear R environment -------------------------------------------
rm(list = ls())
```


# Libraries 
```{r}

# Load the required packages
library("dplyr")
library("readr")
library("tidyr")
library("tidyverse")
library("stringr")
library(gbm)
library(dismo)
library(raster)
```

# Load Data
## Lab Data
```{r}
lab <- read_delim("Data/abiotic_lab.csv")
```

# Prepare Data 
```{r}
lab <- lab[ ,-c(1:11, 13, 15:23)]

lab_model <- lab |>
  select(-Varia, -join_key, -x, -y, -z, -Sampling_site)
```
